sentences.sContent: By performing core displacement and micro pore model displacement experiments, the mechanism and changing law of saliferous reservoir parameters were studied.
sentences.sContent_eng: By performing core displacement and micro pore model displacement experiments, the mechanism and changing law of saliferous reservoir parameters were studied.
sentences.sCn: 通过岩心驱替以及砂岩微观孔隙模型驱替实验，研究了高含盐油藏水驱储层参数变化机理和规律。

sentences.sContent: There are various saliferous soils in circum-Bohai area. In road construction along the sea, the setting of subgrades is induced mainly by dissolution of salt in soils.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are various saliferous soils in circum-Bohai area. In road construction along the sea, the setting of subgrades is induced mainly by dissolution of salt in soils.
sentences.sCn: 环渤海地区广泛分布各种类型的盐渍土，在沿海道路施工中，土中盐类的溶解是造成地基沉陷的主要原因。

trans.tranOther: (esp of rock strata) containing or producing salt
